paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Tyr-77 associated with hereditary amyloidosis.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We recently studied a patient of German descent with peripheral neuropathy and bowel dysfunction.

functional_data.summary: Variant detected in patient's DNA using restriction enzyme SspI and a specifically tailored genomic prealbumin probe.

variants.segregation_data: Detected in other family members identified as gene carriers.
variants.additional_notes: This is the sixth prealbumin variant implicated in amyloidosis.
key_quotes: This is the sixth prealbumin variant implicated in amyloidosis.
Amino acid sequence analysis of the patient's plasma prealbumin revealed both normal and variant prealbumin molecules.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text provided, allowing for thorough extraction of relevant data.
